mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.sid, t.inv_doc_category_code, t.movement_type_code, t.doc_category_code, t.remark, t4.name AS doc_category_name, t.status, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t5.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.is_client_define, t.is_storehouse_edit, t.is_storehouse_location_edit, t.sort, t2.name AS inv_doc_category_name, t3.name AS movement_type_name from s_con_in_out_stock_doc_category t LEFT JOIN s_con_inventory_document_category t2 ON t.inv_doc_category_code = t2.code LEFT JOIN s_con_movement_type t3 ON t.movement_type_code = t3.code LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_category t4 ON t.doc_category_code = t4.code LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 ON t.creator_account = t5.user_name
